column4:
// init NAME_BALLOT, $2b
不行!
整個入口都被貓
怪擋住了!
得回去向博士報
告才行!
column6: actually this whole part is from 0e

column5:
// init NAME_1C, $29
What?
A monster cat?
What shall we do..?

column4:
// init NAME_1C, $29
有了!
使用老鼠來吸引
牠的注意力!
但是沒有電力，
該怎麼製作呢⋯

// init NAME_1C, $29
真叫人生氣!
在不得已的情況
下，
只好使用發條的
製品了。
雖然那會非~常
的丟臉⋯⋯
你等一下~
我找一下零件⋯
column5:
// init NAME_1C, $29
How frustrating!
As a last resort, I'll have to make them spring- powered.
Even though it would be embarrasing for me to make clockwork rats..
Give me a bit, and I'll find the parts I need..

column4:
// init NAME_1C, $29
槽糕~
我一直認為，
製做發條的機械
製品，
是可恥的行為。
所以把它們全丟
了!
巴洛特，抱歉了
。
得找到發條才行
!
column5:
// init NAME_1C, $29
Darn it!
I used to think that making clockworks was below me, so I threw all those parts out.
Sorry, Ballot, but I need some springs!

column4:
// init NAME_1C, $29
要做成機械老鼠
，
得找到發條才行
。
column5:
// init NAME_1C, $29
To make the robot rats, we need a spring.

column4:
// init NAME_BLANK, $16
發條?
雷歐博士要的嗎
?
沒想到他也會要
這種東西⋯
發條放在⋯在⋯
在⋯⋯
在哪裡?
峨~今天的天氣
真是好呀!
只是烏雲多了點
。
column5:
// init NAME_BLANK, $16
Springs? I never thought Dr. Leo would need such a thing...
Where did I put it...?
Ah, today's weather sure is nice, but dark clouds are gathering...

column4:
// init NAME_BLANK, $16
對了!
就是發條嘛!
我忘了放哪裡了
⋯⋯
就在這些寶貝堆
裡，
自已找吧!
column5:
// init NAME_BLANK, $16
Ah, right!
The spring!
I forgot where I put it, so feel free to search in these piles of treasure!
